targets.rawSql:
select concat(
       ccto::text,'|'
     , kbps::text,'|'
     , tipo::text,'|'
     , m1::text,'|'
     , em1 ::text,'|'
     , sm1::text,'|'
     , m2::text,'|'
     , em2::text,'|'
     , sm2::text,'|'
     , m3::text,'|'
     , em3::text,'|'
     , sm3::text,'|'
     , mte::text,'|'
     , mts::text), now() as time
 

from (

 

with t as (
select distinct
       ponto || '::' || interface as ccto
     , kbps
     , tipo
     , mes
     , (mes || '-01')::timestamp as mt
     , mme::numeric(5,2) as mme
     , mms::numeric(5,2) as mms
from (
  select distinct
         p.nome as ponto
       , r.kbps
       , r.tipo
       , interface, mes
       , avg(mde) over (partition by t.hostname, interface, mes) as mme
       , avg(mds) over (partition by t.hostname, interface, mes) as mms
  from (
    select hostname, interface, mes, data
         , ((e08+e12+e14)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mde
         , ((s08+s12+s14)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mds
    from (
      select upper(hostname) as hostname, interface, left(data::text,7) as mes, data
           , extract(dow from data) as dow
           , e08::float, e12::float, e14::float 
           , s08::float, s12::float, s14::float 
        from indicadores_desempenho_gtic 
       where cliente =  'MODELO'
         --and data between '$inicio' and '$fim'
         and data between (left((current_date - interval '3 months')::text,7) || '-01')::date and  ((left(current_date::text,7) || '-01')::date -Interval '1 day')::date 
       order by 1,2,3
    ) t
    where ((e08 > -1) or (e12 > -1) or (e14 > -1) or (s08 > -1) or (s12 > -1) or (s14 > -1))
      and dow in (1,2,3,4,5)
  ) t, ponto p, rede r
  where (t.hostname,p.hostname,r.hostname) = (p.hostname,r.hostname,t.hostname)
    and t.interface = r.iface
  order by 1,2
) t
)
select distinct
       t1.ccto
     , t1.kbps
     , t1.tipo
     , t1.mes as m1
     , t1.mme as em1 
     , t1.mms as sm1
     , t2.mes as m2
     , t2.mme as em2
     , t2.mms as sm2
     , t3.mes as m3
     , t3.mme as em3
     , t3.mms as sm3
     , ((t1.mme+t2.mme+t3.mme)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mte
     , ((t1.mms+t2.mms+t3.mms)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mts
  from t t1, t t2, t t3
where (t1.ccto,t2.ccto,t3.ccto) = (t2.ccto,t3.ccto,t1.ccto)
   and t1.mt < t2.mt
   and t2.mt < t3.mt
order by 1

 

) t
where mte > 55 or mts > 55

panels.title: Alertas de localidades com alta utilizaÃ§Ã£o nos Ãºltimos 3 meses

targets.rawSql:
select concat(
       ccto::text,'|'
     , kbps::text,'|'
     , tipo::text,'|'
     , m1::text,'|'
     , em1 ::text,'|'
     , sm1::text,'|'
     , m2::text,'|'
     , em2::text,'|'
     , sm2::text,'|'
     , m3::text,'|'
     , em3::text,'|'
     , sm3::text,'|'
     , mte::text,'|'
     , mts::text), now() as time
 

from (

 

with t as (
select distinct
       ponto || '::' || interface as ccto
     , kbps
     , tipo
     , mes
     , (mes || '-01')::timestamp as mt
     , mme::numeric(5,2) as mme
     , mms::numeric(5,2) as mms
from (
  select distinct
         p.nome as ponto
       , r.kbps
       , r.tipo
       , interface, mes
       , avg(mde) over (partition by t.hostname, interface, mes) as mme
       , avg(mds) over (partition by t.hostname, interface, mes) as mms
  from (
    select hostname, interface, mes, data
         , ((e08+e12+e14)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mde
         , ((s08+s12+s14)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mds
    from (
      select upper(hostname) as hostname, interface, left(data::text,7) as mes, data
           , extract(dow from data) as dow
           , e08::float, e12::float, e14::float 
           , s08::float, s12::float, s14::float 
        from indicadores_desempenho_gtic 
       where cliente =  'MODELO'
         --and data between '$inicio' and '$fim'
         and data between (left((current_date - interval '3 months')::text,7) || '-01')::date and  ((left(current_date::text,7) || '-01')::date -Interval '1 day')::date 
       order by 1,2,3
    ) t
    where ((e08 > -1) or (e12 > -1) or (e14 > -1) or (s08 > -1) or (s12 > -1) or (s14 > -1))
      and dow in (1,2,3,4,5)
  ) t, ponto p, rede r
  where (t.hostname,p.hostname,r.hostname) = (p.hostname,r.hostname,t.hostname)
    and t.interface = r.iface
  order by 1,2
) t
)
select distinct
       t1.ccto
     , t1.kbps
     , t1.tipo
     , t1.mes as m1
     , t1.mme as em1 
     , t1.mms as sm1
     , t2.mes as m2
     , t2.mme as em2
     , t2.mms as sm2
     , t3.mes as m3
     , t3.mme as em3
     , t3.mms as sm3
     , ((t1.mme+t2.mme+t3.mme)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mte
     , ((t1.mms+t2.mms+t3.mms)/3)::numeric(5,2) as mts
  from t t1, t t2, t t3
where (t1.ccto,t2.ccto,t3.ccto) = (t2.ccto,t3.ccto,t1.ccto)
   and t1.mt < t2.mt
   and t2.mt < t3.mt
order by 1

 

) t
where mte > 5 or mts > 5
